channel.title: Hit bugg
channel.description: On my server when people uses 2h weps with over 100 str bonus will get high hitted Example : I use dds and some1 uses Gs (gs - 130 str bonus ) and we going to fight im using spec and it will hit 30-49-20 He died and say im haxing.. How can i remove this gay bugg :S

item.title: Hit bugg
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

30-49-20? …

Urrhh… How about in your hitDiff, set it to like…
misc.random(playerMaxHit);

That will go by the bonus and level of the player. Yet if it still doesn’t work, i suggest making a method that will hit, based on str bonus, and fightType.

Read full topic

item.title: Hit bugg
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

Dude, its the same as runescape -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Hit bugg
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Change the str bonuses of the items you require in “item.cfg” or in some servers “item.txt”

Read full topic
